explanation: As the ring falls towards the wire, the magnetic field through it increases.
According to Lenz's law, the induced current will create a field to oppose this increase.
Based on the configuration (Ring on left/right and current direction), if the Key is C (Clockwise), it implies the induced field is into the page (if B is out) or similar opposing mechanism.
